channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nissan’s next CEO says it needs partners and he’s open to Honda
item.description: “A CEO is normally dealing with one or two major crises in his or her career. I’m gonna have to deal with four or five at the same time."

item.title: Trump signs order to make voters show proof of citizenship in elections, with swift pushback expected from states which set their own voting rules
item.description: The order’s documentary proof of citizenship requirement signals that the president is not waiting for congressional Republicans to pass their long-an...

item.title: Hegseth fends off reporter’s questions about Signal chat leak: 'I know exactly what I'm doing'
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth on Tuesday fended off a reporter’s questions about a leaked Signal chat group about forthcoming strikes on the Houthis ...

item.title: Rep. Lauren Boebert suggests GOP could rename DC ‘District of America’: 'Keep the jokes at bay'
item.description: Washington, D.C., could be renamed to the "District of America," U.S. Rep. Lauren Boebert told fellow lawmakers Tuesday during a hearing.

item.title: Meet the March Madness millionaires: From Duke’s Cooper Flagg to Purdue’s Braden Smith, college athletes are raking in eight-figure NIL deals
item.description: Through NIL deals, college athletes can earn their own money from using their image.

item.title: Republicans in Mike Waltz's old district aren't mad at him or Trump over Yemen Signal chat
item.description: As Washington was roiled by the news that one of President Donald Trump's top aides added a journalist to a group chat discussing military plans, many...

item.title: Waltz takes 'full responsibility' for 'embarrassing' Signal leak

item.title: Obama vs Trump: Political giants back opposing candidates in widely-watched Wisconsin Supreme Court contest
item.description: Former President Barack Obama and President Donald Trump have lined up on opposite sides of Wisconsin's state Supreme Court contest.

item.title: GOP senator says Dr Oz ignored his questions on transgender issues, abortion
item.description: Josh Hawley still has concerns about where Dr. Oz stands on abortion and transgender treatments for minors, and he says the nominee isn't answering.

item.title: Months after calling Wizz Air’s unlimited flights deal a ‘marketing scam’, Michael O’Leary’s Ryanair launches its own subscription service
item.description: Michael O'Leary mocked Wizz Air's "All You Can Fly" deal as a marketing stunt. Now he's letting Ryanair passengers spend £79 on a "Prime" deal.

item.title: RNC asks states for details about their voter files, part of a larger effort to question elections
item.description: The Republican National Committee on Tuesday launched a massive effort to probe voter registration lists nationwide amid a broader strategy to seize o...

item.title: GSA slashes must-sell property list from 443 to 8
item.description: The General Services Administration has cut its target list of non-core properties it wants to dump from 443 down to just eight -- all of which had pr...

item.title: DHS tells judge Trump couldn't bring Venezuelan 'terrorists' back to U.S.
item.description: A defiant Trump administration defended its decision not to turn planes with Venezuelan gang suspects around midair, telling a judge late Tuesday that...

item.title: Gov. Youngkin proposes withholding state funding from Virginia's 'sanctuary cities'
item.description: Virginia Gov. Glenn Youngkin is threatening to withhold state funding from local governments if they do not cooperate with federal immigration authori...

item.title: Democrat Cites Amy Coney Barrett To Back False Claims About Federal Censorship
item.description: Democrats are able to play dumb about the censorship-industrial complex in part because Barrett's decision gives them the ammunition to claim it doesn...

item.title: The Trump Administration Falls Back on Flippancy
item.description: Officials have responded to the text-thread security failure and other weighty controversies with sass and indifference.

item.title: Dick Durbin Has Walked The Earth For 80 Years And Never Heard The Word ‘Wrongthink’
item.description: Sen. Dick Durbin, directly quoting Ben Weingarten in The Federalist, claimed he did not know the meaning of "wrongthink."

item.title: Another Big Reason Congress Should Make the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act Permanent
item.description: Preserving lower rates and other essential provisions while delaying or forgoing carve-outs would provide certainty for states.

item.title: Michelle Wu vs. Immigration Enforcement
item.description: Progressives such as Wu still can’t give up their near-theological commitment to illegal immigration.

item.title: Hemingway To Dem: You Play Dumb About The Censorship-Industrial Complex Because It Works For Your Party
item.description: ‘In part, because you can rely on the censorship-industrial complex to do the work for you,’ Hemingway retorted.

item.title: Columbia Pays for Its Sins
item.description: Free academic inquiry is advanced, not stifled, in this case. But the Trump administration should take more care to follow the rules.

item.title: ‘Free Speech’ Group Forces Taxpayer-Funded Texas University To Feature Trans Sex Shows
item.description: A judge is forcing Texas A&M University to host explicit drag shows on campus after the Foundation for Individual Rights and Expression sued.

item.title: Mollie Hemingway Delivers Masterclass Explainer On The ‘Government-Funded’ War On Free Speech
item.description: 'They know our voice is so powerful and influential that they can’t accomplish their goals unless they shut us down. They will not succeed.'

item.title: Simple Economics May Derail the MAHA Reform of Food Stamps
item.description: Smarter policies and healthier citizens are worthy goals. But good intentions alone won’t deliver them.

item.title: Net Worth Optimization: A New Era of Personalized Risk Optimization
item.description: From mean variance optimization to net worth optimization. We no longer need to ask which is more important, the client’s attitude toward risk or the ...

item.title: Year of Shifting Sands: Reflections on the 2024 Global IPO Market
item.description: The dynamics of global capital flows are shifting. While the overall IPO market contracted last year, a closer look paints a more nuanced picture.

item.title: Book Review: Buffett’s Early Investments
item.description: This book digs into Buffett’s pre-Berkshire investments. The result is a fresh look into the origins of his investment approach.

item.title: The Alternative View: 401(k) Plans Are Better off Without Private Investments
item.description: The debate over the inclusion of private investments in 401(k) plans is a hot topic. Are DC plans better off without them?
